name: Disable Windows Defender Functionalities Via Registry Keys
description: Detects when attackers or tools disable Windows Defender functionalities via the Windows registry
author: AlertIQ, Ján Trenčanský, frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel

detection.condition: selection_main and 1 of selection_dword_* and not 1 of filter_optional_*

falsepositives: Administrator actions via the Windows Defender interface
